title: Unchained Alistar
body: Is the method of unlocking this disabled? And wondering about the Riot Trist and Dreadknight Garen too :/

replies.body:
Some of those links can be problematic. You can hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do to sort this out together. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
Just one from me. These don't  appear acccsessable for oce . would a support ticket allow me to nab unchained alistar for an oce account?
Absolutely! We got mad love for our OCE players so we won't leave you behind. :)
